subject: Darts (Game)
lead_paragraph: Michael van Gerwen of the Netherlands won his first world darts title by beating Peter Wright, 7-4, in London to help make up for losing the final to Phil Taylor last year.
snippet: Michael van Gerwen of the Netherlands won his first world darts title by beating Peter Wright, 7-4, in London to help make up for losing the final to Phil Taylor last year.
